name: Buggy Extreme Driving
description: Buggy Extreme Driving is an amazing, new and awesome 3D parking simulator game. Buggy parking drive is difficult but smooth drive as compare to off-road drive because the ultimate off-road truck or car drive is heavy driving side. If you are a good heavy car parking hero than this buggy parking mania is really challenging for you and your friends. Easy control with steering wheel, gas and brake pedals. Drive a heavy buggy in the parking area and save from crashing and colliding with traffic cones or any other obstacles. This 3d parking game has amazing buggy to drive in parking zone, nice background sound, different camera views and gorgeous environment.
